data.title: Fix typo of function name in AsyncTaskPool
data.body:
I fixed a small spelling mistake: `destoryInstance` -> `destroyInstance`.

Also, this pull request marks the old API as deprecated for backwards compatibility reasons.
Thanks!

data.title: Support loading .psd file
data.body:
I wonder why cocos2d doesn't support .psd file now?

I have checked the code, and noticed that when I create a sprite by calling `Sprite::create(const std::string& filename)`. This function would finally call `Director::getInstance()->getTextureCache()->addImage()` to load the texture file.

However, the comment said, `* Supported image extensions: .png, .bmp, .tiff, .jpeg, .pvr.`. There is no ".psd". :(

I wonder are you going to support loading psd file in the future?

Please let me know if I have missed anything. Thank you so much.

data.title: exported api for Cocos Studio.
data.body:
1) exported 'jsb_get_or_create_weak_jsobject' in ScriptingCore.h.
2) exported 'std_string_to_jsval' in js_manual_conversions.h.
3) exported 'js_get_type_from_native' as 'js_get_type_from_node' in cocos2d_specifics.hpp.

data.title: Upgrades to Chipmunk v7.0
data.body:
( This PR is based on this one with some fixes and more tests: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/pull/14949 )
- Upgrades to Chipmunk v7.0
  - multithreaded
  - faster (Neon optimized + 2 threads)
- Removes `PhysicsDebugDraw` (uses internally `DrawNode`)
- Updates JS bindings
- Chipmunk JS bindings are generated **AUTOMATICALLY** (do not manually edit them)
- The JS API is about 95% backwards compatible... there a few things that are not backwards compatible due to the changes in the API in Chipmunk
- Build systems updated

data.title: Dead link in README
data.body: The link in the readme for the "Temporary Cocos2d-JS documents" to http://cocos2d-x.org/docs/manual/framework/html5/en is dead. It throws an nginx error.

data.title: iOS deployment target wrong
data.body: You're stating iOS 6 runtime support, but some third-party libraries are compiled with 8.3 as deployment target.

data.title: Add FlatBuffers serialize function for language data used in Cocos Studio.
data.body: @xiaofeng11 @pandamicro

data.title: Fix reloadSpriteFramesWithDictionary function won't support new TexturePacker output format type 3
data.body: New TexturePacker output type support only add to addSpriteFramesWithDictionary function, but not add to reloadSpriteFramesWithDictionary function, so when reload texture in editor, the image is broken.

data.title: Add "id" for parser object
data.body: Add "id" for parser object

data.title: Animation not working in Lua running on iOS devices
Removed if else check for previous file
data.body: This if else is causing issues on Windows Emulator 10.0.10586. An assertion failed on getFileSize() fails the second time an audio file is played in the game.

data.title: Set music volume control as default
data.body:
Cocos2d-x uses STREAM_MUSIC for audio and video playback, however this stream is not set as a volume control stream. If any audio is playing, pressing volume keys will affect audio level, however, if app is silent at the moment, volume keys will change alarm level.

So the user will have to use volume keys exactly when something is playing to change the sound level which is a bad experience. This commit fixes the issue.

Based on http://developer.android.com/training/managing-audio/volume-playback.html

data.title: Fix lua engine crashes caused by CC_ENABLE_GC_FOR_NATIVE_OBJECTS
js_cocos2dx_Node_removeFromParentAndCleanup : wrong number of arguments
Fix all capital letters on Android (Editbox)
data.body: This patch sets capital letter at sentences start only, not on every single character.

data.title: Fix return value of VertexAttribBinding::init()
data.body: According to the declaration, `VertexAttribBinding::init()` function must return a bool type value, not null pointer constant. So this pull request replaces `NULL` with `false`, to avoid implicit conversion of null to bool.

data.title: Cannot load sound resources in android
data.body:
I use SimpleAudioEngine to play sound for my game. It's work in iOs. But in Android, It get errors such as " cocos2d: fullPathForFilename: No file found at winner_sound.mp3. Possible missing file." 
I use cocos2dx version 3.10 and  sound file is already existed in file apk.
Anyone can help me?
